column5: I am headed to Timmins on March break for a Provincial Ringette Tournament.  I will be dragging my son along and wish to possibly take him ice fishing.  Does anyone have any recommendations as far as outfitters in that area that could offer us a hut?  I don't care what we fish for just looking to get out for an afternoon or two.  Thanks  Bryan

I'm heading up there for a job opportunity this week if I can get everything sorted out by the weekend I'm looking to hit the ice.   If I come across anything I'll pm you.  Any guys in the area wanna play guide beers afterwards are on me.
For a DIY outing, bring an auger and frozen smelt and your lines. I would recommend Porcupine Lake right in town for pike action. Access the lake at Deadman's Point (south side of lake half way).
PM Tayzak 15.  He lives there & contributes to this forum.
